Detailed Description

Main window class.

Tonatiuh's main window class. It includes the menu bars and all the actions, signals and slots to provide user interaction with the program.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

QWidget *  parent = 0,
Qt::WindowFlags  flags = 0 
)

Creates a new MainWindow object.

Destroyes MainWindow object.

Shows a dialog to allow define current light position with a position calculator.

Changes the number of the grid cells and grid cell dimensions.

Set current document coin scene into Tonatiuh Models and views.

void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition ( double  azimuth,
double  zenith 
) [protected, slot]

Changes the light position to the position defined by azimuth and zenith. The parameters are defined in radians.

void MainWindow::Copy ( QString  nodeURL ) [slot]

Copies the node defined with the nodeURL to the clipboard.

The current node cannot be the model root node or concentrator node.

void MainWindow::Copy (  ) [slot]

Copies current node to the clipboard. The current node cannot be the model root node or concentrator node.

SoSeparator * MainWindow::CreateGrid ( int  xDimension,
int  zDimension,
double  xSpacing,
double  zSpacing 
) [private]

Creates a xDimension by zDimension grid and shows in the 3D view. Each grid cell is a xSpacing x zSpacing.

void MainWindow::CreateGroupNode (  ) [slot]

Creates a new group node as a selected node child.

void MainWindow::CreateMaterial ( QString  materialType ) [slot]

Creates a materialType material node from the as current selected node child.

If the current node is not a surface type node or materialType is not a valid type, the material node will not be created.

void MainWindow::CreateMaterial ( TMaterialFactory *  pTMaterialFactory ) [protected, slot]

Creates a material node from the pTMaterialFactory as current selected node child.

If the current node is not a surface type node, the material node will not be created.

QToolBar * MainWindow::CreateMaterialsTooBar ( QMenu *  pMaterialsMenu ) [private]

Creates a toolbar for insert material actions.

void MainWindow::CreateShape ( TShapeFactory *  pTShapeFactory ) [protected, slot]

Creates a shape node from the pTShapeFactory as current selected node child.

If the current node is not a surface type node, the shape node will not be created.

Creates a shape node from the pTTrackerFactory as current selected node child.

void MainWindow::CreateShape ( QString  shapeType ) [slot]

Creates a shapeType shape node from the as current selected node child.

If the current node is not a valid parent node or shapeType is not a valid type, the shape node will not be created.

Creates a surface node as selected node child.

Creates a trackerType shape node from the as current selected node child.

void MainWindow::Cut (  ) [slot]

If there is a node selected and this node is not the root node, cuts current selected node from the model. Otherwise, nothing is done.

void MainWindow::Cut ( QString  nodeURL ) [slot]

If there nodeURL is a valid node url and this node is not the root node, cuts current selected node from the model. Otherwise, nothing is done.

Defines Tonatiuh model light paramenters with a dilog window.

bool MainWindow::Delete ( QModelIndex  index ) [private]

Creates a new delete command, where the index node was deleted.

Returns true if the node was successfully deleted, otherwise returns false.

void MainWindow::Delete (  ) [slot]

* Deletes selected node if there is a valid node to delete.

void MainWindow::Delete ( QString  nodeURL ) [slot]

Creates a new delete command, where the node with the nodeURL was deleted.

If nodeURL is not a valid node url, nothing is done.

void MainWindow::DisplayRays ( bool  display ) [protected, slot]

If actionDisplay_rays is checked the 3D view shows rays representation. Otherwise the representation is hidden.

void MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap (  ) [protected, slot]

Writes the photons stored at the photon map at user defined file. Creates a dialog to define the export paramenters.

void MainWindow::InsertFileComponent ( QString  componentFileName = QString( "" ) ) [slot]

Inserts an existing tonatiuh component into the tonatiuh model as a selected node child.

The component is saved into componentFileName file.

void MainWindow::InsertUserDefinedComponent (  ) [slot]

Inserts an existing tonatiuh component into the tonatiuh model as a selected node child.

A open file dialog is opened to select the file where the existing component is saved.

QString  pasteType = QString( "Shared" ) 
) [slot]

Inserts a new node as a nodeURL node child. The new node is a copy to node saved into the clipboard. The pasteType take "Shared" or "Copied" values.

tgc::PasteType  type 
) [private]

Creates a new type paste command. The clipboard node is inserted as nodeIndex node child.

void MainWindow::Run (  ) [slot]

bool MainWindow::Save (  ) [slot]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved in the current file. Otherwise, returns false.

If a current file is not defined, it calls to SaveAs funtios.

See also:
SaveAs, SaveFile.
bool MainWindow::SaveAs (  ) [slot]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved. Otherwise, returns false. A file dialog is created to select a file.

See also:
Save, SaveFile.
bool MainWindow::SaveComponent (  ) [slot]

Saves selected node subtree as a component in a file. A dialog is opened to select a file name and its location.

bool MainWindow::SaveFile ( const QString &  fileName ) [private]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved into the the given fileName. Otherwise, returns false.

See also:
Save, SaveAs.
void MainWindow::SelectNode ( QString  nodeUrl ) [slot]

Changes selected node to the node with nodeUrl. If model does not contains a node with defined url, the selection will be null.

Sets rays as the number of rays to trace for each run action.

void MainWindow::SetSunPositionCalculatorEnabled ( int  enabled ) [protected, slot]

This property holds whether the SunPositionCalculator action is enabled. If the action is disabled, it does not disappear from menu, but it is displayed in a way which indicates that they are unavailable.

void MainWindow::ShowBackground (  ) [protected, slot]

Action slot to show/hide viewer background.

void MainWindow::ShowCommandView (  ) [protected, slot]

Shows a windows with the applied commands. The most recently executed command is always selected. When a different command is selected the model returns to the state after selected command was applied.

void MainWindow::ShowGrid (  ) [protected, slot]

Action slot to show/hide a grid with the scene dimensions.

bool MainWindow::StartOver ( const QString &  fileName ) [private]

Returns to the start origin state and starts with a new model defined in fileName. If the file name is not defined, it starts with an empty scene.

Returns the fullFileName file�s name, without path.

void MainWindow::Undo (  ) [protected, slot]

Reverts a change to Tonatiuh model. The model is returne to the previous state before the command is applied.
